name: Apoxy
headline: The Proxy Platform
description: Apoxy is the proxy platform for improving the security, observability, and usability of APIs and services at scale. Our programmable proxy allows developers to write code that handles the operational concerns of their applications rather than piles of configuration. We've built an ingress and egress traffic controller with a tool belt of extensions that solve common problems like monitoring, authentication, load balancing, data compatibility, and much more.

founders.name: Matt Ward, Founder
founders.description: CEO and co-founder at Apoxy. Previously worked on YouTube's video player and internal APIs then helped build the API for video at Mux. Proudly part of the only generation of professional Flash engineers which helped him start his career in funny video on the internet at CollegeHumor. Enjoys exploring mountains on skis and bicycles.

founders.name: Dmitry Ilyevsky, Founder
founders.description:
Technical co-founder of Apoxy - a programmable traffic controller that helps companies build and operate APIs at scale. Before Apoxy spent 15 years in the industry working on compute clusters and networking fabrics at Render, Mux, Cruise, Google, and Motorola.

Generalist with a focus on networking and systems. Semi-retired alpinist and current ultra long-distance runner.

## What's your Edge?
Simpler and cheaper multi-cloud andcross-platform deployments.
[Try Apoxy for free![Arrow Icon Button](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66905e742cab830340b8fb27_Frame%20\(4\).svg)](https://apoxy.dev/<https:/dashboard.apoxy.dev>)
### Simple site-to-site connectivity
![tIck](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5b9ddf7286099215784c_caret--right.svg)
Secure WireGuard tunnels
![tIck](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5b9ddf7286099215784c_caret--right.svg)
Connect HTTP, TCP, or UDP instantly
![tIck](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5b9ddf7286099215784c_caret--right.svg)
Powerful access controls via our API
![tIck](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5b9ddf7286099215784c_caret--right.svg)
No complex firewalls or VPC peering
### Architected to meet you where you are
![tIck](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5b9ddf7286099215784c_caret--right.svg)
Kubernetes, Docker, or a simple process
![tIck](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5b9ddf7286099215784c_caret--right.svg)
Single or multi-node deployments
![tIck](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5b9ddf7286099215784c_caret--right.svg)
Run on our cloud or yours
### Ship your custom logic to the edge
![tIck](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5b9ddf7286099215784c_caret--right.svg)
Deploy custom TypeScript or Go filters
![tIck](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5b9ddf7286099215784c_caret--right.svg)
High performance WebAssembly runtime
![tIck](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5b9ddf7286099215784c_caret--right.svg)
Solutions engineers available
### Understand usage and performance
![tIck](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5b9ddf7286099215784c_caret--right.svg)
OpenTelemetry and Jaeger native
![tIck](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5b9ddf7286099215784c_caret--right.svg)
Schema-less log indexing
![tIck](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5b9ddf7286099215784c_caret--right.svg)
Sub-second querying for fast troubleshooting
## Get more for less
[ Pricing Details![Arrow Icon Button](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66905e742cab830340b8fb22_Frame%20\(4\).svg)](https://apoxy.dev/</pricing>)
![Feature icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec4e25f8d3a47a2cb2feaa_piggy-bank--slot.svg)
### $0.05/GB
competitive bandwidth pricing and 100GB free to get started
![Feature icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec4e6f79a80a751408bf78_location.svg)
### 35+ locations
our cloud proxies always run close to your users for the lowest possible latency
![Feature icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec4f2de95441826aa4d9db_encryption.svg)
### Unlimited TLS
because security isn't something you should have to pay more for
![Feature icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5004fc67a48e4114f63b_arrows--horizontal.svg)
### $1/Million
simple flat rate for HTTP, REST, or WebSocket requests
## The Kitchen Sink
![Feature icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec50d9bc61d27e9fdfde3a_locked.svg)
Instant TLS for any domain
![Feature icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec510f3589b8c215a095f2_traffic--flow.svg)
Flexible Traffic Management
![Feature icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5262568b29837b2d20eb_ibm-watson--discovery%20\(1\).svg)
Centralized Access Logs
![Feature icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec52b542dfabcc9226020a_traffic-cone.svg)
Global Rate Limiting
![Feature icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5119e7b8f8597da0aaa8_police.svg)
Custom Security Policies
![Feature icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec52d9de1c5ca621db11eb_store.svg)
Infrastructure for Dev Portals
![Feature icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec5385113c40f9eb8cd859_credentials.svg)
Quota Management
![Feature icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec539deb01c4ceb07b450c_vlan.svg)
Peer-to-Peer Tunnels
![Feature icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec53e3e6c807e28b573a43_ibm--cloudant.svg)
Run Anywhere - BYOC/on-prem
![Feature icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec53fab5e341bd94a6b07b_train--speed.svg)
Application Acceleration
## Missing something?Build it or ask us.
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec561699b32071101944cd_gopher.png)
### Go
Our go-to language for high-traffic middleware.
[Get started![Arrow Icon Button](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66905e742cab830340b8fb27_Frame%20\(4\).svg)](https://apoxy.dev/<https:/apoxy.dev/docs>)
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec564dbff29fe8e74d4593_javascript-js.svg)
### JavaScript
Run even un-trusted JavaScript in our WebAssembly sandbox.
[Get started![Arrow Icon Button](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66905e742cab830340b8fb27_Frame%20\(4\).svg)](https://apoxy.dev/<https:/apoxy.dev/docs>)
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec566b9c3646e643884b35_typescript-icon.svg)
### TypeScript
JavaScript but with types? Sure. Grab the SDK to get our JavaScript's run-time safety and type-safety.
[Get started![Arrow Icon Button](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66905e742cab830340b8fb27_Frame%20\(4\).svg)](https://apoxy.dev/</docs>)
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66ec56ebb5e341bd94a96a67_request-quote.svg)
### CustomSolutions
Want something?Ask us to build it.
Get in touch![Arrow Icon Button](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66905e742cab830340b8fa86/66905e742cab830340b8fb27_Frame%20\(4\).svg)
## Get an edgewith Apoxy.
Better glue code.

generated_description:
### Apoxy: The Next-Gen Proxy Platform

Founded in 2023, **Apoxy** is shaking up the developer tools landscape from its base in San Francisco. As part of Y Combinator’s Batch S23, they're positioning themselves as the go-to **proxy platform** for enhancing the **security**, **observability**, and **usability** of APIs and services—especially at scale. 

Instead of drowning developers in endless configuration files, Apoxy puts the power back in their hands. With a **programmable proxy**, they allow developers to craft custom code that addresses operational concerns, making the development process smoother and more efficient.

**What Apoxy Offers:**
- **Ingress and Egress Traffic Management:** An integrated traffic controller for handling data flow.
- **Flexible Extensions:** Solutions for common issues like monitoring, authentication, load balancing, and data compatibility—all within a single tool.
- **Multiple Connectivity Options:** Secure WireGuard tunnels that support HTTP, TCP, and UDP connections, simplifying networking.
- **Kubernetes and Docker Support:** Designed to accommodate a range of deployment scenarios whether you’re running on their cloud or your own.
- **Custom Logic Solutions:** Deploy your own TypeScript or Go filters and make use of a high-performance WebAssembly runtime for custom processing needs.

**Pricing:** 
- Get started with competitive rates of **$0.05/GB** for bandwidth and **$1/Million** for requests on HTTP, REST, or WebSocket—plus 100GB free to kick things off.

**The Team:**
Currently, the Apoxy squad is a nimble but mighty team of two, under the guidance of Group Partner **Michael Seibel** from Y Combinator. 

**Tags for Apoxy:**
- Developer Tools
- B2B
- API
- San Francisco Bay Area

### What’s the Bottom Line?
Apoxy isn’t just another tool in the vast sea of developer resources; it aims to streamline the way developers manage their application concerns. Their approach is refreshingly straightforward: eliminate complexity, provide powerful tools, and deliver them at a fair price. With Apoxy, the goal is clear—help developers focus more on writing code and less on managing infrastructure.

For more information, check out their website: [apoxy.dev](https://apoxy.dev).
